# idsec_sia_settings_ssh_mfa_caching (Data Source)

SIA SSH MFA Caching Settings Data Source.

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `client_ip_enforced` (Boolean) Whether client IP is enforced for MFA caching
- `is_mfa_caching_enabled` (Boolean) Whether MFA caching is enabled
- `key_expiration_time_sec` (Number) Expiration time for the MFA caching key in seconds
